Vlad nodded once.

Vlad: Aff, but the warrior who believes in his cause is willing to 
give his life for it. Besides, you are machines. You can be rebuilt. 
Thus, you should not fear death.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Starstorm:
> 
> "A warrior alive is more useful than one death" replied

> when retreat and when fight"
